sent.orig: Accounting principles are also referred to as standards.
sent.trans: 会计原则也可称作会计标准。

sent.orig: Administrative personnel should also acquire some technical skills.
sent.trans: 管理人员也应该学几门手艺。

sent.orig: Air not only occupies space but it also has weight.
sent.trans: 空气不仅占据空间，而且它还具有重量。

sent.orig: An advocate for John could make out a case for him on this score also.
sent.trans: 约翰的一位律师在这方面也能提出有利于他的理由。

sent.orig: And not only to peace, but also to democratic institutions and personal liberty.
sent.trans: 同时不仅是对和平的威胁，而且也是对民主制度和个人自由的威胁。
